minecraft:written_book_content.title: Old Book
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Nayhr
pages: {"text":"Barely any pages can be read but you take note of what you can."}
{"text":"Entry 3 - What a marvelous world\n\nSeasons not only change with time but biome, dimension & locations above and below ground."}

{"text":"Entry 7 - Dangerously exciting behavior\n\nEvery being living, dead & construct has awoken mysterious abilities. Although it seems the more aggressive the creature was the greater its new arsenal."}

{"text":"Entry 9 - Work Ethic\n\nI always knew villagers were fond of emeralds, but who knew a steady supply would keep them working rather than simply trading. Stashing them in the pack animal in the center of town turned out to be a wise decision."}
{"text":"Entry 13 - The still hearts\n\nI can hear something beating beneath my feet, calling to me, alluring me. Yet all I find when I go searching are old pots. Should I disturb these relics...?"}
